inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows the presence of a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a 31-year-old woman complaining of abdominal pain.

notes: Patient has acute appendicitis with localized tenderness and guarding in the right lower quadrant, making her a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
